io.hekate.messaging.broadcast.BroadcastCallback

  • Packages that use BroadcastCallback 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.messaging
    MessagingService API.

    • Uses of BroadcastCallback in io.hekate.messaging

      Methods in io.hekate.messaging with parameters of type BroadcastCallback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessagingChannel.broadcast(T message, BroadcastCallback<T> callback)
      Asynchronously broadcasts the specified message and notifies the specified callback upon the operation completion.
